ExtendedProperties.Value: ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًۭى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: (is) the book no doubt in it a Guidance for the God-conscious

ExtendedProperties.Name: Example
ExtendedProperties.Value: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَعْثَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَعْلَمُوا أَنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَعْثَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّۭ وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَا

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: And similarly We made known about them that they might know that (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) true and that (about) the Hour (there is) no

ExtendedProperties.Name: Example
ExtendedProperties.Value: فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ مَرَضٌ فَزَادَهُمُ اللَّهُ مَرَضًا

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: In their hearts (is) a disease so has increased them Allah (in) disease and for them (is) a punishment painful

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: Those who believe in the unseen and establish the prayer and out of what We have provided them they spend

ExtendedProperties.Name: Example
ExtendedProperties.Value: أَتَأْمُرُونَ النَّاسَ بِالْبِرِّ وَتَنْسَوْنَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ تَتْلُونَ الْكِتَابَ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: أَنفُسَكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ تَتْلُونَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: yourselves while you [you] recite the Book Then, will not you use reason

ExtendedProperties.Name: Example
ExtendedProperties.Value: وَاتَّبَعُوا مَا تَتْلُو الشَّيَاطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَانَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَا تَتْلُوا۟ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۖ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: And they followed what recite(d) the devils over (the) kingdom (of) Sulaiman And not disbelieved Sulaiman [and] but

ExtendedProperties.Name: Example
ExtendedProperties.Value: وَعَلَىٰ أَبْصَارِهِمْ غِشَاوَةٌ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَعَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِمْ ۖ وَعَلَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ غِشَـٰوَةٌۭ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: on their hearts and on their hearing and on their vision (is) a veil And for them (is) a punishment great
